journals.unauthorized: You are not allowed to manage journals.
journals.unauthorized_edit: You are not allowed to edit this journal.

forms.new_instructions: Enter the name of your journal, and a brief description. Press save to continue.

properties.draft_mode_instructions: A draft project is only visible to users who are able to modify it.
properties.show_home_instructions: If selected, this journal will be highlighted on the home page.
properties.homepage_priority_instructions: Journals with a higher number will display first on the home page.
properties.social_card_placeholder: Optionally, Enter a Social Card Title
properties.social_descript_placeholder: Optionally, Enter a Social Card Description

modals.delete_body: {{title}} has passed into the endless night.
modals.confirm_heading: Are you sure you want to delete this journal?

issues.instructions: Manage the journal's issues from this screen. Each issue references a Manifold project, which is the container for the issue's content.

volumes.delete_body: Volume #{{number}} has passed into the endless night.
volumes.confirm_heading: Are you sure you want to delete this volume?
